category: news
title: "Marginal rise in global IT outsourcing demand in Q1, 2021: Everest Group"
excerpt: "Global IT outsourcing demand witnessed a marginal increase quarter-on-quarter with 436 outsourcing transactions completed in Q1 2021 compared to 422 in Q4 2020, says a report by Everest Group. The uptick in global sourcing transactions in Q1 2021 over Q4 2020 was driven by demand for cloud services,"
